methods.name: project_path
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
MetricsServiceV2Client.project_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified project resource name string.

methods.name: metric_path
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
V2
MetricsServiceV2Client.metric_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified metric resource name string.

params.name: credentials
params.description: Provides the means for authenticating requests made by the client. This parameter can be many types. A Google::Auth::Credentials uses a the properties of its represented keyfile for authenticating requests made by this client. A String will be treated as the path to the keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A Hash will be treated as the contents of a keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A GRPC::Core::Channel will be used to make calls through. A GRPC::Core::ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client. The channel credentials should already be composed with a GRPC::Core::CallCredentials object. A Proc will be used as an updater_proc for the Grpc channel. The proc transforms the metadata for requests, generally, to give OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

params.name: metadata
params.description: Default metadata to be sent with each request. This can be overridden on a per call basis.

params.name: exception_transformer
params.description:
An optional proc that intercepts any exceptions raised during an API call to inject
custom error handling.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging/v2"

metrics_service_v2_client = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::MetricsServiceV2Client.new
formatted_parent = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::MetricsServiceV2Client.project_path("[PROJECT]")

# Iterate over all results.
metrics_service_v2_client.list_log_metrics(formatted_parent).each do |element|
  # Process element.
end

# Or iterate over results one page at a time.
metrics_service_v2_client.list_log_metrics(formatted_parent).each_page do |page|
  # Process each page at a time.
  page.each do |element|
    # Process element.
  end
end

params.name: parent
params.description:
Required. The name of the project containing the metrics:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]"

params.name: page_size
params.description:
The maximum number of resources contained in the underlying API
response. If page streaming is performed per-resource, this
parameter does not affect the return value. If page streaming is
performed per-page, this determines the maximum number of
resources in a page.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: yield
params.description: Access the result along with the RPC operation

returns.description:
An enumerable of Google::Logging::V2::LogMetric instances.
See Google::Gax::PagedEnumerable documentation for other
operations such as per-page iteration or access to the response
object.

params.name: metric_name
params.description:
The resource name of the desired metric:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]/metrics/[METRIC_ID]"

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: yield
params.description: Access the result along with the RPC operation

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging/v2"

metrics_service_v2_client = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::MetricsServiceV2Client.new
formatted_parent = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::MetricsServiceV2Client.project_path("[PROJECT]")

# TODO: Initialize +metric+:
metric = {}
response = metrics_service_v2_client.create_log_metric(formatted_parent, metric)

params.name: parent
params.description:
The resource name of the project in which to create the metric:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]"

The new metric must be provided in the request.

params.name: metric
params.description: The new logs-based metric, which must not have an identifier that already exists. A hash of the same form as Google::Logging::V2::LogMetric can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: yield
params.description: Access the result along with the RPC operation

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging/v2"

metrics_service_v2_client = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::MetricsServiceV2Client.new
formatted_metric_name = Google::Cloud::Logging::V2::MetricsServiceV2Client.metric_path("[PROJECT]", "[METRIC]")

# TODO: Initialize +metric+:
metric = {}
response = metrics_service_v2_client.update_log_metric(formatted_metric_name, metric)

params.name: metric_name
params.description:
The resource name of the metric to update:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]/metrics/[METRIC_ID]"

The updated metric must be provided in the request and itâ€™s +name+ field must be the same as +[METRIC_ID]+ If the metric does not exist in +[PROJECT_ID]+, then a new metric is created.

params.name: metric
params.description: The updated metric. A hash of the same form as Google::Logging::V2::LogMetric can also be provided.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: yield
params.description: Access the result along with the RPC operation

params.name: metric_name
params.description:
The resource name of the metric to delete:

"projects/[PROJECT_ID]/metrics/[METRIC_ID]"

params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
